title: Pass The Test | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Pass The Test | Joel Osteen
description:
Every test is an opportunity to rise higher. If you want to see God’s favor in greater ways, you have to be willing to grow through the challenges. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
